general_provisions: This bill requires the State Board of Education to create model policies on the use of technology and artificial intelligence in a public school classroom.
hilighted_provisions: This bill:<hr><ltbullet>defines terms;<hr><ltbullet>requires the State Board of Education (state board) to include certain technology standards in core education standards;<hr><ltbullet>creates certain requirements for a local education agency (LEA) related to the use of technology in the classroom;<hr><ltbullet>requires the state board to create a model policy on:<hr><ltbullet1>the balanced use of technology in the classroom; and<hr><ltbullet1>the use of artificial intelligence in the classroom;<hr><ltbullet>creates certain requirements for specific grade levels when using technology in the classroom;<hr><ltbullet>exempts certain groups from the grade level requirements when using technology in the classroom;<hr><ltbullet>creates a reporting requirement;<hr><ltbullet>gives authority to the state board to create rules;<hr><ltbullet>requires LEAs to provide additional resources to certain students; and<hr><ltbullet>allows public high schools to create and offer a sandbox artificial intelligence course.
